title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention - User scoping RBAC
description:
,Delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). The RBAC controls will extend to the Microsoft 365 Defender portal for Information Protection and DLP related events.Â
